wikipedia_page.main: Joshua King (16 January 1798 – 1 September 1857) was the Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cambridge from 1839 to 1849. He was also the President of Queens' College, Cambridge, from 1832 until his death and Vice-Chancellor of Cambridge University from 1833–4.

response: *Joshua King, Lucasian Professor of Mathematics, President of Queens' College, Cambridge
